trans-unit.resname: PCY·1 | Abolish | Card Name
PCY·1 | Abolish | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: You may discard a plains from your hand instead of paying CARDNAME's mana cost.\nDestroy target artifact or enchantment.
trans-unit.target: 你可改为从你手上弃掉一张平原，以代替支付CARDNAME的魔法力费用。消灭目标神器或结界。

trans-unit.resname: PCY·2 | Aura Fracture | Card Name
PCY·2 | Aura Fracture | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Sacrifice a land: Destroy target enchantment.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲一张地：消灭目标结界。

trans-unit.resname: PCY·3 | Avatar of Hope | Card Name
PCY·3 | Avatar of Hope | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nIf you have 3 life or less, CARDNAME costs o6 less to play.\nCARDNAME may block any number of creatures.
trans-unit.target: 飞行若你的生命少于或等于3，则CARDNAME的费用减少o6即可使用。CARDNAME可阻挡任意数量的生物。

trans-unit.resname: PCY·4 | Blessed Wind | Card Name
PCY·4 | Blessed Wind | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.target: 目标玩家的生命成为20点。

trans-unit.resname: PCY·5 | Celestial Convergence | Card Name
PCY·5 | Celestial Convergence | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME comes into play with seven omen counters on it.\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, remove an omen counter from CARDNAME. If there are no omen counters on CARDNAME, the player with the highest life total wins the game. If two or more players are tied for highest life total, the game is a draw.
trans-unit.target: 天国辐辏进场时，上面有七个预兆指示物。在你的维持开始时，从天国辐辏上移去一个预兆指示物。若在天国辐辏上没有预兆指示物，则总生命最高的玩家赢得此盘游戏。若两位以上的玩家同时有最高的总生命，则此盘游戏为和局。

trans-unit.resname: PCY·6 | Diving Griffin | Card Name
PCY·6 | Diving Griffin | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nAttacking doesn't cause CARDNAME to tap.

PCY·7 | Entangler | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Enchanted creature may block any number of creatures.
trans-unit.target: 受此结界的生物可阻挡任意数量的生物。

PCY·8 | Excise | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Remove target attacking creature from the game unless its controller pays o\nX.
trans-unit.target: 除非目标进行攻击之生物的操控者支付oX，否则将该生物移出游戏。

PCY·10 | Glittering Lion | Card Text | Paragraphs

You may play the card as though it were in your hand as long as the card remains removed from the game. At end of turn, if you haven't played the card, return it to its owner's hand.

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures as long as you control no untapped lands.
trans-unit.target: 只要你未操控未横置的地，CARDNAME便只能被神器生物或黑色生物阻挡。

trans-unit.resname: PCY·65 | Flay | Card Name
PCY·65 | Flay | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target player discards a card at random from his or her hand. Then that player discards another card at random from his or her hand unless he or she pays o1.
trans-unit.target: 目标玩家从他的手上随机弃掉一张牌。然后除非该玩家支付o1，否则他再从手上随机弃掉一张牌。

PCY·66 | Greel, Mind Raker | Card Text | Paragraphs

trans-unit.resname: PCY·67 | Greel's Caress | Card Name
PCY·67 | Greel's Caress | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: You may play CARDNAME any time you could play an instant.\nEnchanted creature gets -3/-0.
trans-unit.target: 你可以在任何能够使用瞬间的时机下，使用CARDNAME。受此结界的生物得-3/-0。

trans-unit.resname: PCY·68 | Infernal Genesis | Card Name
PCY·68 | Infernal Genesis | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player puts the top card of his or her library into his or her graveyard. He or she then puts X 1/1 black Minion creature tokens into play, where X is that card's converted mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 在每位玩家的维持开始时，该玩家将他的牌库顶牌置入他的坟墓场。然后他将X个1/1黑色奴仆衍生物放置进场，X等同于该牌的总魔法力费用。

trans-unit.resname: PCY·69 | Nakaya Shade | Card Name
PCY·69 | Nakaya Shade | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: oo\nB CARDNAME gets +1/+1 until end of turn unless any player pays o2.
trans-unit.target: oB：除非任何玩家支付o2，否则CARDNAME得+1/+1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: PCY·70 | Noxious Field | Card Name
PCY·70 | Noxious Field | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchanted land has "oc\nT: This land deals 1 damage to each creature and each player."
trans-unit.target: 受此结界的地获得「ocT：此地对每个生物和每位玩家各造成1点伤害」。

trans-unit.resname: PCY·71 | Outbreak | Card Name
PCY·71 | Outbreak | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: You may discard a swamp from your hand instead of paying CARDNAME's mana cost.\nChoose a creature type. All creatures of that type get -1/-1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 你可改为从你手上弃掉一张沼泽，以代替支付CARDNAME的魔法力费用。选择一种生物种类。所有该种类的生物得-1/-1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: PCY·73 | Plague Fiend | Card Name
PCY·73 | Plague Fiend | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME对生物造成战斗伤害时，除非该生物的操控者支付o2，否则消灭该生物。

trans-unit.resname: PCY·74 | Plague Wind | Card Name
PCY·74 | Plague Wind | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy all creatures you don't control. They can't be regenerated.
trans-unit.target: 消灭所有不受你操控的生物。那些生物不能重生。

trans-unit.resname: PCY·75 | Rebel Informer | Card Name
PCY·75 | Rebel Informer | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can't be the target of white spells or abilities.\no3: Put target Rebel card on the bottom of its owner's library.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME不能成为白色咒语或异能的目标。o3：将目标反抗军牌置于其拥有者的牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: PCY·76 | Rhystic Syphon | Card Name
PCY·76 | Rhystic Syphon | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: 除非目标玩家支付o3，否则他失去5点生命，并且你获得5点生命。

PCY·77 | Rhystic Tutor | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.target: 除非任何玩家支付o2，否则你从你的牌库中搜寻一张牌，将该牌置入你的手上，然后将你的牌库洗牌。

PCY·78 | Soul Strings | Card Text | Paragraphs

trans-unit.target: 除非任何玩家支付oX，否则将两个目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回你的手上。

PCY·84 | Branded Brawlers | Card Text | Paragraphs

trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature card comes into play, its controller puts a creature token into play that's a copy of that creature.\nWhenever a creature card leaves play, remove all tokens with the same name as that creature from the game.\nWhen CARDNAME leaves play, remove all tokens created with it from the game.
